short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay up to date on your favorite series. Customize notifications & manage all in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Audible Alerts, the ultimate tool for keeping track of your favorite series of books! With this browser extension, you can easily stay up to date on the latest releases and never miss a new book again. Here's how it works:

* Add any series you're interested in to your list and receive notifications when a new book becomes available: This helps you stay up to date on the latest releases in your favorite series and ensures you don't miss out on new books.
* Manage all of your series in one place: This makes it easy to stay organized and keep track of all the series you're following.
* Customize your notification preferences: You can choose how and when you want to receive notifications, so you can stay informed without being bombarded with alerts.
* Add books or serieses trhough the extension or on the page directly: This makes it easy to add new series to your list, whether you are looking for them or are just surfing.
 * Works with stand-alone novels: In addition to series, you can also add stand-alone novels to your list and receive notifications when a series is released for them.
* Import your existing library: With Audible Alerts, you can easily import your existing library of series books and add them to your list. This saves you time and makes it easy to stay up to date on the latest releases in the series you're already following.

With Audible Alerts, staying up to date on the latest releases has never been easier. So why wait? Try it out today and never miss a new book again!
